meanings.definition: Not damaged or marked in any way
meanings.sent1: The mirror showed her reflection in an unblemished state.
meanings.sent2: The fresh snow on the mountain was unblemished by footprints.
meanings.sent3: The unblemished cake was a sight to behold at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her unblemished reputation shone brightly in the community.
meanings.sent5: The unblemished sky stretched endlessly above us.

meanings.sent1: The jeweler examined the diamond and declared it unblemished.
meanings.sent2: The artist's unblemished canvas was ready for a new masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The unblemished plan went off without a hitch.
meanings.sent4: Her unblemished record at work earned her a promotion.
meanings.sent5: The unblemished flower petals glistened in the sunlight.
